sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A catalogue of all the cheifest [sic] rarities in the publick theater and anatomie-hall of the University of Leyden, by Gerrard Blancken, which are so set in order that all may easily bee found in their places. Schuyl, Frans. Blancken, Gerard, ed. Maersche, Corn. à.
12 p.
by Hubert vander Boxe, Printed in Leyden : 1695.
Catalogue originally written by Frans Schuyl and edited by Gerrard Blancken. Latin verse on p. 2 headed: In Anatomicum Theatrum Lugd. Batav. Signed at foot: Corn. à Maersche. Information as to authorship and editorship from other editions. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======

12 p.
by Hubert vander Boxe, Printed in Leyden : 1695.
Catalogue originally written by Frans Schuyl and edited by Gerrard Blancken. Latin verse on p. 2 headed: In Anatomicum Theatrum Lugd. Batav. Signed at foot: Corn. à Maersche.
